{{Lang|'''Una'''|ain=ウナ}} is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the World Quest series [[Through the Mists]]. She also appears as a spirit after the quest series is done at the ruins north of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] near [[Moshiri Ceremonial Site]].

==Location==
During the "Through the Mists" series, Una can be found on the left side of [[Moshiri Ceremonial Site]] speaking to [[Abe]].
<gallery>
NPC Location Abe & Una.png|Una's location
NPC Location Abe & Una Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

After the completion of the "Through the Mists" series, Una can be found as a ghostly figure at the ruins north of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] near [[Moshiri Ceremonial Site]].
<gallery>
NPC Location Ghost Una.png|Una's location
NPC Location Ghost Una Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>
